name: Buckshot Bill's Deadly Walk
description:
This is a game where you play as the very cylindrical Buckshot Bill. One day, he is going on a walk when all of a sudden, he is swarmed by RED Cylinders. Can you and Buckshot Bill survive?

Feel free to mute my music since it was my first time making in-game music. (:

-Controls-

"a" and "d" to rotate your gun around the character

left click on mouse within the area of the map to take the character there

right click on mouse to shoot gun
